wikipedia_page.main:
George Wilfrid Lawton (born 9 February 1911, date of death unknown) was a British canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics.
In 1936 he finished eighth in the folding K-1 10000 m event.

response: * George Lawton (footballer, born 1862) (1862–1930), English footballer for Stoke
